summary: This is an email chain from May 2019 between an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York and FBI personnel, requesting the shipment of FBI Florida's case files on Jeffrey Epstein and a related investigation to SDNY for copying as part of an ongoing investigation. It reveals coordination between SDNY and FBI New York on the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email states SDNY has an open investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and is requesting FBI Florida's case files on him.

events.title: SDNY Follow-up Request for Epstein Files
events.description: An AUSA from SDNY follows up on a prior request for FBI Florida to ship case files on Jeffrey Epstein and a related investigation to SDNY for copying.

events.title: Initial SDNY Request for Epstein Files
events.description: An AUSA from SDNY sends an initial request to FBI Florida to ship case files on the investigations of Jeffrey Epstein and a related subject to SDNY for a vendor to copy, citing an open investigation and discovery needs.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) had an open investigation into Jeffrey Epstein as of May 2019.
SDNY was working on the Epstein investigation in partnership with FBI New York.
SDNY requested FBI Florida ship all case files and agent work-product related to the Epstein investigation and a related investigation for copying.
The request was made to ensure SDNY had a complete copy of all records for its investigation and to comply with future discovery obligations.
The correspondence indicates the existence of multiple boxes of official case files and agent work-product from the Florida investigations.
